summary: An unemployed architect's pregnant wife finds him a job as driver on Craigslist. Showing up, he starts right away driving prostitutes to clients. Will he survive the day?
cast: Jason Biggs|Janet Montgomery|Ashley Tisdale|Bria L. Murphy|Jenny Mollen|Steven Weber|Adrian Voo|Robert Hoffman|Rusty Joiner|Cedric Yarbrough|Russell Steinberg|David J. Phillips|Bryson Jones Allman|Benjamin Barrett|Noris Rose Bentivegna|Jon Eidson|Gerrit Goossen|David Anthony Hernandez|Laura Krafft|Miss Lopez Lecube|Dan Martin|Ian McLaren|Ian McQuown|Andrew Montanez|Avi Nash|Rigo Obezo|Eric Siegel|Nick Smith|Christina Veronica
title: Amateur Night
